answers.answer: Hello,It looks like erectile dysfunction. Common causes causing erection problem are stress and anxiety, poor communication with your partner, unrealistic sexual expectations, which make sex a task rather than a pleasure, negative feelings about non performance, smoking, alcohol and sometimes illicit drugs and medical conditions like diabetes, high blood pressure, heart or thyroid conditions, poor circulation, low testosterone, depression etc.In your case smoking can be one of the reasons. I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: Ive been having a where i just have a real hard erections with the foreplay and 1 min into sex. it always reverts back to semi hard all the time. semi hard as in enough to stand but now hard to keep going.. it just feels so hard just to keep it hard. Im i impotent?. I just quit smoking a week back and im 26 yrs old.
title: Hard erections that lead to semi hard erections=impotency?
